feed.title: Bioinformatics Technology Lab
feed.subtitle: Bioinformatics Technology Lab at Canada's Michael Smith Genome Sciences Centre. Primarily interested in de novo genome assembly. More description.

entry.title: Presenting at ABCD Conference
entry.content:
John Smith and James Green presented their research at ABCD Conference this past weekend

We have the presentation notes and paper here. Here is an image from this fantastic conference
